sys_ux_client_script.name: secondary_items/items

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_55a015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253afad
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">cda015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af58</macroponent><name>secondary_items/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports
  */
function evaluateProperty({ api }) {
    if (api.context.app.record_secondary_values_location !== 'sidebar'
        && api.data.gform && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader
        && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems
        && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems.length) {
        const secondaryItems = api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems;
        return secondaryItems.map((item) => {
            let value = {};
            if (item.type === "reference")
                value = {
                    "type": "text-link",
                    "label": item.displayValue,
                    "href": "javascript:void(0)",
                    "value": item.sysId,
                    "data": item
                };
            else if (item.type === "highlighted")
                value = {
                    "type": "highlighted-value",
                    "label": item.displayValue,
                    "status": item.colorName,
                    "showIcon": item.showIcon,
                    "value": item.sysId,
                    "data": item
                };
            else
                value = {
                    "type": "string",
                    "value": item.displayValue,
                    "data": item
                };

            return {
                "label": item.fieldLabel,
                "value": value
            };
        });
    }
    return [];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-02 21:23:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>55a015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253afad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>secondary_items/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_55a015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253afad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-02 21:23:18</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
